code: con <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(), dbdir = "data.duckdb") tbl1 <- dplyr::tbl(con, "table1") # ... 50 lines later: Is the connection still valid? Who closed it?

title: Connection Management
text: R6 class centralizes connection pinned tables:
code: library(dbProject)  proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project/") proj$pin_write(my_tbl, "expression_data")  # Later (even after R restart): proj <- dbProject$new(path = "my_project/") proj$reconnect() my_tbl <- proj$pin_read("expression_data")
